---
title: Quarto Dashboard Nav Buttons
subtitle: including custom nav items
format:
  dashboard:
    embed-resources: true
    logo: img/quarto.png
    nav-buttons:
      - text: About
        href: https://quarto.org/docs/dashboards/layout.html
      - icon: wikipedia
        target: _blank
        href: https://www.wikipedia.org
---

## Row {height=20%}

### Column {width=30%}

This dashboard displays the Nav Items from the YAML frontmatter. 

### Column {width=70%}

```yaml
format:
  dashboard:
    embed-resources: true
    logo: img/quarto.png
    nav-buttons:
      - text: About
        href: https://quarto.org/docs/dashboards/layout.html
```

## Row {height=20%}

### Column {width=30%}

We can also include other Nav Items: 

### Column {width=70%}

```yml
format:
  dashboard:
    embed-resources: true
    logo: img/quarto.png
    nav-buttons:
      - icon: wikipedia
        target: _blank
        href: https://www.wikipedia.org
```
